channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow, S&P 500 Hit Records After Rate Cut
item.description: Industrials push above 42000 in delayed response to Fed lowering rates; tech shares and risky assets rise.

item.title: FedEx’s lower full-year forecast sinks its stock, as customers look to save on deliveries
item.description: The package-delivery giant said reduced demand for priority services and higher operating costs weighed on its results.

item.title: Should You Refinance Your Mortgage? The Fed's Big Cut Changed the Math
item.description: Millions can potentially save money by refinancing, but many are waiting for rates to drop further.

item.title: This is what the Fed’s interest-rate cut means for distressed companies
item.description: This week’s aggressive Fed rate cut could provide some breathing space for distressed companies, notes one bankruptcy attorney.

item.title: Hedge Fund Two Sigma Is in Settlement Talks With SEC
item.description: The firm is likely to pay as much as $100 million to settle a probe of a trading scandal.

item.title: Nike’s shares are rallying after it named a new CEO. One analyst says it still has work to do.
item.description: Elliott Hill will replace John Donahoe as chief executive next month, following months of struggles for the athletic-wear giant.

item.title: The Fed Aims to Repeat Greenspan's 1990s Masterpiece
item.description: The 1995 cuts helped lay the groundwork for a soft landing and the late ’90s boom years.

item.title: High-yield bond ETF rallies after Fed rate cut as ‘free ride’ in cash ends
item.description: Investors are mulling strategies beyond cash on expectations that interest rates will continue to fall after the Fed’s big rate cut.

item.title: Stocks Slip After Fed Cuts Rates
item.description: The Dow and S&P 500 finished lower after the Federal Reserve voted to cut interest rates by half a percentage point.

item.title: ‘He was in the early stages of dementia’: My father put my brother on the deed to his house. His lawyer had a big conflict of interest. What do we do?
item.description: “Should we seek a lawyer to work on our behalf?”
